title: Airplane
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular, with notched gilded border and in the center a scene showing a stylized airplane flown by a young man and woman, a red flying carpet, a couple dressed in medieval costume, a chained ogre, caged birds
